resources.string: User action is required to launch JamesDSP
Tap to grant capture permission and enable JamesDSP\'s audio processing
JamesDSP stopped due to audio session control loss. Please disable other audio effect apps.
Audio processing stopped. Another app is interfering with JamesDSP.
Please disable all other apps that provide global audio effects before re-enabling JamesDSP.
JamesDSP stopped due to incompatible media app. Please check the notification to resolve this problem.
Audio processing stopped. Another app is interfering with JamesDSP.
Tap this notification to resolve the problem.
JamesDSP has been stopped because the audio capture permission was revoked.
No Activity found to handle action
Your device manufacturer has disabled the internal audio recording APIs. This application cannot work without them.
Selected script has no customizable parameters
Open active script in built-in editor
This assistant will help you to set-up this app.
Currently, this application is unfinished and unstable. Please note that it may not work on some devices as expected since it uses Android APIs not designed for use by third parties.

One or more permissions were revoked by you or the system.
In order to ensure that this app behaves correctly, you need to grant these permissions again.

Please redo the setup wizard to re-grant these permissions.
Important! Please read the notes carefully before continuing.
\u25CF Recommended\n\u25CF No external computer required\n\u25CF Android 11+ only
\u25CF For advanced users\n\u25CF Computer and USB cable required\n\u25CF Android 10+ supported
\u25CF Recommended\n\u25CF No external computer required\n\u25CF All Android versions
\u25CF Recommended, if root is not set-up\n\u25CF No external computer required\n\u25CF Android 11+ only
\u25CF For advanced users\n\u25CF Computer and USB cable required\n\u25CFAll Android versions
No root access available. Please use another setup method.
Failed to grant permission via root. Please use another setup method.
This app requires special permissions for dumping your device\'s audio policy. Please follow the instructions below.

Launch \'Shizuku\' and look for \'Start via Wireless Debugging\'. Tap the \'Pairing\' button and follow the in-app instructions. After pairing Shizuku with your device, start the Shizuku server by pressing the \'Start\' button in their app. If you run into problems while setting up Shizuku, please refer to their setup tutorial linked in their app.
Tap the button and grant this app access to Shizuku.
Shizuku is not yet installed. Please download and install it from Google Play first.
Please start the Shizuku server before requesting permission. Go back to instruction step 2.
This application requires Shizuku version 11 or later. Please update Shizuku to the latest version.
Please grant this application access to Shizuku. You may need to open Shizuku\'s permission manager and grant the permission manually if you previously denied it and the popup no longer shows.
Shizuku failed to grant ADB permissions
Please wait a few seconds and try again. If it still does not work, try the alternative method.
Please follow the instructions first and try again. The ADB access is not yet set-up properly.
Go to Android\'s hidden development settings and enable USB debugging. You need to unlock these settings by tapping the build number in the system settings several times.
Open https://app.webadb.com in your computer\'s browser (works best in Chrome) and connect your device using USB to the computer.
Add and connect the USB device in WebADB.
Navigate to \'Interactive Shell\' and execute the following command in the shell: \'pm grant %s android.permission.DUMP\'
Tap \'Next\' in this app to continue.
(Optional) You can permanently skip the audio capture permission prompts by executing this command: \'appops set %s PROJECT_MEDIA allow\'
(Optional) In addition to the previous step, you can also enable auto-start by executing the following command: \'appops set %s SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW allow\'
Additional permissions are required to use this application. Please review them and tap \'Next\' to grant them.
Required to record internal audio. The hardware microphone is not activated.
Required to receive important status updates and information about JamesDSP\'s processing state.
You need to explicitly grant this app permission to record audio content every time it launches.
Please grant all requested runtime permissions to continue.\nIf you repeatedly denied the permissions, you need to grant them manually in the system settings.
This app submits crash reports and other diagnostic data, including information about other active applications, to allow me to detect and solve compatibility issues and bugs easier.
If you encounter any issues, please visit the troubleshooting options.
Audio effect apps using Android\'s built-in Dynamic Processing effect interfere with this app.
Apps blocking internal audio capture remain unprocessed (e.g., Spotify, Google Chrome).

HW-accelerated audio playback (fast tracks) may sometimes cause duplicated audio or kill JamesDSP in some circumstances. Please add the affected music player to the excluded apps list to prevent JamesDSP from re-routing it.
After an app has opened a new media session to playback audio, you may hear duplicated or cut-off audio for a very short period (about <250ms).
This app may add some delay to the audio stream. You can add movie/video apps to the exclusion list to prevent AV-desync by not processing them.

Changes made to Android's audio subsystem by your device manufacturer can easily break this app because it uses a few undocumented APIs.
It has been tested on these devices:
â€¢ Samsung S20+ (Android 12)
â€¢ AOSP emulator (Android 10â€“13)
â€¢ Google Pixel 6 Pro (Android 13)
Apps blocking audio capture stay muted (default Android behavior)
Apps blocking audio capture are excluded and remain unprocessed (recommended)
Only listen for session events from the system
Don\'t take any action (may cause duplicated audio)

Enabling this setting can cause duplicated audio when another audio effects app takes control of an audio session.\nPlease keep this setting disabled unless you encounter false-positive session loss events.
Per-app control and enhanced support for apps enabled

When enhanced processing is enabled, you can selectively exclude certain apps from being processed by JamesDSP. Use the 3-dot menu on the bottom right corner and select 'Excluded apps' to access this feature.

While legacy mode is disabled, JamesDSP relies on media apps to send a system broadcast when they start playback. This is an advantage over legacy mode because each app gets its own JamesDSP effect engine assigned to it, which allows for more fine-grained control. Otherwise, with legacy mode turned on, all apps would share a single processing engine, which Android deprecates and should not be used anymore.

Unfortunately, not all media apps do this correctly and, therefore, would not function correctly with legacy mode disabled. To solve this issue, you can enable enhanced processing. Instead of relying on system broadcasts about new media sessions, JamesDSP will proactively scan for media sessions by itself and allow proper support for uncooperative media apps.
You need to restart all active media apps after changing this setting to resume audio processing.
Warning: Low buffer sizes may cause audio issues such as clipping!
Increases performance of effects that use convolver modules

While this setting is enabled, each audio device is assigned a separate audio configuration. This app will automatically switch between device profiles when the output device changes. 

Each new device that is connected starts with a blank profile. You can then configure it or copy settings from another device profile.

Note: Presets are only applied to the active profile while this feature is enabled. Inactive profiles remain untouched.
Tap the \'Active device profile\' button on the main screen to copy or delete profiles.
Don\'t exclude app from recent tasks list
Exclude app from recent tasks list
Prompt for capture permission after boot
Don\'t start service automatically after boot
Keep processing even when no content is playing
Pause audio pipeline to save power
Show details about the limitations of this app
Allow notification access for better session detection
Enables more reliable audio session detection
Restore bundled IRS, DDC, and scripts
Unpack preloaded assets if you lost them

Server did not respond correctly. Make sure the software at https://github.com/ThePBone/AutoEqApi is correctly set up on the server.

Network error: %1$s

Showing the first %1$d results. Please fine-tune your search to get more relevant results.
Script file does not exist or cannot be opened.
Liveprog has been automatically turned on.
Cannot run script because JamesDSP is disabled. Please turn on JamesDSP to execute scripts.
The current script has unsaved changes. Do you want to save your changes or discard them?
Do you want to remove this app from the exclusion list?

This app does not support processing apps that block third parties from recording their audio output. To prevent these apps from being muted due to their capture restrictions, they are automatically excluded from audio processing and are not re-routed.

Affected apps:
%s
Audio processing has been suspended to prevent duplicated audio
The following app is unsupported because it causes RootlessJamesDSP to lose control over its audio routing:
Please check the app\'s settings if you can disable HW-acceleration or other settings that could interfere with RootlessJamesDSP and tap \'Retry\'.
Alternatively, select \'Exclude\' to bypass this issue by excluding the incompatible app from audio processing.
Please install the JamesDSP magisk module and reboot your Android device to use this application. You may also need to reinstall this app after rebooting.
This flavor of JamesDSP was designed to be used with a rooted/modified device. A non-root alternative with some limitations is also available. Tap here for details.

If you already installed the magisk module, you may have chosen the wrong settings during installation. Please re-install and try to enable Huawei compatibility (even if your phone is not from that manufacturer).

This feature is only available when \'enhanced processing\' is enabled in the settings. Please go to \'Settings > Audio processing > Enhanced processing\' and enable that option to access this menu.\n\nNote: \'Enhanced processing\' can not be used while legacy mode is enabled.
Enhanced processing has been disabled due to a missing permission. Please re-setup it in settings.
Invalid number format. Changes not applied.
Value must be a multiple of %1$d. Changes not applied.
Do you want to reset your current JamesDSP preset to the default values?
Failed to import file. Unsupported file URI.
Please help us to translate this app into your language! Tap here to visit the project site on Crowdin.
Failed to download update package. Please check your internet connection. Details: %1$s
Update installed. The app is now restartingâ€¦
No new updates available at the moment
Tap here to download and install the new update.
The backup has been created with a newer version of this application and cannot be loaded. Please update this app to continue.
Can be used to restore the current settings later
Backups only include impulse responses, scripts, VDC files, presets, and the current audio configuration for maximum compatibility with other versions.
JamesDSP magisk package requires an update

The JamesDSP magisk package installed on your device is outdated and not supported by this app anymore.

Please retrieve the latest JamesDSP magisk package ZIP and install it via Magisk.
Note that the magisk package may replace this app with the official JamesDSP app.

Do you want to visit the download website for the Magisk packages now?
Failed to start. The installed JamesDSP magisk package is too old and not supported by this app anymore.
